mapper.sql: id, config_code, temp1, temp2, temp3, temp4, temp5, temp6, temp7, temp8, temp9, temp10, if_onl, remark, org_id, tenant_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted, deleted_user_id, delete_user_name,tenant_code
mapper.update: UPDATE system_config SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
